name: Noisy Town
description:
This is my first project in Unity. It was made within one week for the Game Dev Unlocked's 2nd game jam with the theme "Lost & Found".

Play as Gary who is looking for his lost daughter Meryl in Noisy Town.

It's an homage to one of the pillars of survival horror. I will keep working on the game after the jam to give it some mechanics and learn more about Unity.

There's no sound at the very beginning of the game. So don't worry or mess with your volume. Also, you need to hit ALT+F4 to quit the game once you found Meryl, since there's no end screen triggered, yet.

Controls: Right now there are no interactions, just walking.

WASD for movement

Mouse for camera

Better only try W for forward and camera with mouse

ALT+F4 to get the fuck out again when you've found Meryl
